analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/40/0xdf747a0a975f868b16c61a9ec44b179d6730ef3b.sol:
	Contract LISA has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/40/0xdf747a0a975f868b16c61a9ec44b179d6730ef3b.sol#215)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/40/0xdf747a0a975f868b16c61a9ec44b179d6730ef3b.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/40/0xdf747a0a975f868b16c61a9ec44b179d6730ef3b.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/40/0xdf747a0a975f868b16c61a9ec44b179d6730ef3b.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
